GUI_SKILLS_TECH_CRAFTING_RECIPES_3_DESCR: **Expert Tech will be part of a future update**
GUI_SKILLS_THREAT_MULTIPLIER_1_DESCRIPTI: Increases the amount of Threat generated per action by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Threat Modifier)},1)]. Provoked Creatures are more likely to target the Citizen with the highest Threat rating. This allows you to draw fire during multi-Citizen combat.
GUI_SKILLS_THREAT_MULTIPLIER_2_DESCRIPTI: Increases the amount of Threat you generate per action by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Threat Modifier)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_THREAT_MULTIPLIER_3_DESCRIPTI: Increases the amount of Threat generated per action by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Threat Modifier)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_THREAT_MULTIPLIER_4_DESCRIPTI: Increases the amount of Threat generated per action by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Threat Modifier)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_THREAT_MULTIPLIER_5_DESCRIPTI: Increases the amount of Threat you generate per action by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Threat Modifier)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_TOOL_CRAFTING_RECIPES_1_DESCR: Unlocks the ability to craft Hammers, Axes and Shovels from Iron, Silver and Gold.
GUI_SKILLS_TOOL_CRAFTING_RECIPES_2_DESCR: Unlocks the ability to craft Hammers, Axes and Shovels from Titanium and Gems.
GUI_SKILLS_TOOL_CRAFTING_RECIPES_3_DESCR: **Expert Tools will be part of a future update**
GUI_SKILLS_VITALITY_1_DESCRIPTION: Increases your Vitality by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Vitality)} Pts,1)] which increases your maximum Health by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Default Max Health)},1)] and your Stability by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Stability)},1)]. Stability it used in the Centraforge.
GUI_SKILLS_VITALITY_2_DESCRIPTION: Increases your Vitality by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Vitality)} Pts,1)] which increases your maximum Health by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Default Max Health)},1)] and your Stability by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Stability)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_VITALITY_3_DESCRIPTION: Increases your Vitality by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Vitality)} Pts,1)] which increases your maximum Health by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Default Max Health)},1)] and your Stability by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Stability)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_VITALITY_4_DESCRIPTION: Increases your Vitality by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Vitality)} Pts,1)] which increases your maximum Health by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Default Max Health)},1)] and your Stability by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Stability)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_VITALITY_5_DESCRIPTION: Increases your Vitality by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Vitality)} Pts,1)] which increases your maximum Health by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Default Max Health)},1)] and your Stability by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Stability)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_VITALITY_6_DESCRIPTION: Increases your Vitality by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Vitality)} Pts,1)] which increases your maximum Health by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Default Max Health)},1)] and your Stability by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Stability)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_VITALITY_7_DESCRIPTION: Increases your Vitality by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Vitality)} Pts,1)] which increases your maximum Health by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Default Max Health)},1)] and your Stability by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Stability)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_VITALITY_8_DESCRIPTION: Increases your Vitality by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Vitality)} Pts,1)] which increases your maximum Health by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Default Max Health)},1)] and your Stability by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Stability)},1)].
GUI_SKILLS_VOLATILE_ATMOSPHERE_ARMOUR_1_: **Atmospheres will be part of a future update**
GUI_SKILLS_VOLATILE_ATMOSPHERE_ARMOUR_2_: **Atmospheres will be part of a future update**
GUI_SKILLS_VOLATILE_ATMOSPHERE_ARMOUR_3_: **Atmospheres will be part of a future update**
GUI_SKILLS_VOLATILE_ATMOSPHERE_ARMOUR_4_: **Atmospheres will be part of a future update**
GUI_SKILLS_VOLATILE_ATMOSPHERE_ARMOUR_5_: **Atmospheres will be part of a future update**
GUI_SKILLS_WARP_DISTANCE_1_DESCRIPTION: Increases your maximum Warp opening distance by $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Warp Distance)} blinksecs,1)].
GUI_SKILLS_WARP_DISTANCE_2_DESCRIPTION: Increases your maximum Warp opening distance by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Warp Distance)} blinksecs,1)].
GUI_SKILLS_WARP_DISTANCE_3_DESCRIPTION: Increases your maximum Warp opening distance by a further $[STYLE(${ATTRIBUTE(Warp Distance)} blinksecs,1)].
GUI_SKILLS_WEAPON_CRAFTING_RECIPES_1_DES: Unlocks the ability to craft Slingbows from Iron, Silver and Gold.
GUI_SKILLS_WEAPON_CRAFTING_RECIPES_2_DES: Unlocks the ability to craft Slingbows from Titanium and Gems.
GUI_SKILLS_WEAPON_CRAFTING_RECIPES_3_DES: **Expert Weapons will be part of a future update**
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_BOON_BOOST_BUFF_: Increases Boon Points gained by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Boost Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)]
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_CORRUPTION_DEBUF: Adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Corruption Debuff 1,VAL,ABS)} Defect Points,2)] each round
Adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Corruption Debuff 2,VAL,ABS)} Defect Points,2)] each round
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_DEFECT_GUARD_BUF: Reduces Defect Points gained by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Guard Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)]
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_DRAIN_DEBUFF_1_D: Drains $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Drain Debuff 1,VAL,ABS)} Vigour,2)] each round
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_DRAIN_DEBUFF_2_D: Drains $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Drain Debuff 2,VAL,ABS)} Vigour,2)] each round
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_EASE_BUFF_DESCRI: Increases the chance of getting $[STYLE(Ease,1)] type Traits.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_EFFECT_BUFF_DESC: Increases the chance of getting $[STYLE(Effect,1)] type Traits.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_ENVIGORATION_BUF: Adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Envigoration Buff 1,VAL,ABS)} Vigour,1)] each round
Adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Envigoration Buff 2,VAL,ABS)} Vigour,1)] each round
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_FATE_BUFF_DESCRI: Point Sliders can get extra chances if they land unfavourably. Also increases the chance of the Sliders landing in good positions.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_FATE_REVERSAL_BU: Adds a $[STYLE(Fate Buff,1)] for every $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Fate Reversal Buff,VAL,ABS)} Defect Points,1)] added each round.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_GAMBLE_BUFF_1_DE: Gives a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Gamble Buff 1,VAL,ABS)}%,1)] chance of Stability costs being reduced to zero each round.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_GAMBLE_BUFF_2_DE: Gives a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Gamble Buff 2,VAL,ABS)}%,1)] chance of Stability costs being reduced to zero each round.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_GLOW_BUFF_DESCRI: Increases the chance of getting $[STYLE(Glow,1)] type Traits.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_LIGHTNESS_BUFF_D: Increases the chance of getting $[STYLE(Lightness,1)] type Traits.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_LONGEVITY_BUFF_D: Increases the chance of getting $[STYLE(Longevity,1)] type Traits.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_PROTECTION_BUFF_: Reduces Stability Loss by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Protection Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)]
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_QUIRK_GUARD_BUFF: Reduces Quirk Points gained by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Guard Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)]
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_SPECIAL_BUFF_DES: Increases the chance of getting $[STYLE(Special,1)] type Traits.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_STABILISATION_BU: Adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Stabilisation Buff 1,VAL,ABS)} Stability,1)] each round
Adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Stabilisation Buff 2,VAL,ABS)} Stability,1)] each round
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_TRAIT_EXPANSION_: Increases the chance that Points will introduce new Traits rather than applying to existing Traits.
GUI_STATUS_EFFECT_FORGE_TRAIT_REDUCTION_: Increases the chance of Points applying to existing Traits rather than introducing new Traits..
GUI_TIP_ADDING_AND_REMOVING_PLOTS_DESCRI: Upsize your Beacon Base with a Beacon Plotter. Extended Plots can be added next to or on top of your current Beacon Area, highlighted in white. Green highlighted areas indicate where new plots can be placed. You cannot claim land belonging to or reserved by another Player. Need to remodel? Plots can be removed using a Beacon Plot Remover
GUI_TIP_ADD_FORGE_INGREDIENT_DESCRIPTION: Select the ingredient you wish to add to the forge from the deck and place it in the center of the forge.
GUI_TIP_ADD_FORGE_INGREDIENT_TITLE: Add An Ingredient To The Forge
GUI_TIP_AGGRO_DESCRIPTION: Attacking Creatures or Healing Citizens in combat generates Aggro. Creatures favour attacking Citizens with the highest rating, however, Aggro does cool down over time.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_CONTROL_DESCRIPTION: Offering a more permanent solution to the Campfire, Beacon Controls protect land and placed objects within from other Players and World Regeneration - providing the Beacon remains fuelled.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_CUSTOMISATION_DESCRIPTION: You can change the colour of your Beacon's flame by adding a Gleam Block in the Colour tab.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_EXPIRED_DESCRIPTION: A Beacon has expired leaving its contents vulnerable to World Regeneration and looting. Fuel Beacons often to keep them active.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_FLAME_COLOUR_DESCRIPTION: You can change the colour of the flame on your Beacon Control by adding Gleam to it.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_FOOTFALL_DESCRIPTION: One of your Beacons has accumulated Coin.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_FUEL_DESCRIPTION: You can use other types of Beacon fuel to power your Beacon for longer periods of time. They can be crafted from rare items or purchased from other citizens.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_FUEL_LOW_DESCRIPTION: A Beacon is expiring, you can view its status in the Places Menu. Remember, add Fuel regularly; an expired Beacon no longer protects its contents from looting or World Regeneration.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_MEMBERSHIP_DESCRIPTION: You've been added as member of a Beacon by the owner. The Beacon and your privileges have been add to your Beacon list.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_OVERVIEW_DESCRIPTION: You can assign a Beacon name, see how much Coin your Beacon has gained from visitors and configure your Beacon in the Overview tab.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_PERMISSIONS_DESCRIPTION: You can allow friends to edit or interact with the contents of your Beacon by assigning them roles in the Permissions tab.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_PERMISSION_PER_PLOT_DESCR: You can assign different Beacon permissions for members for each plot inside your Beacon. Place a Beacon control in the plot you wish to edit and change the permissions on the Beacon control.
GUI_TIP_BEACON_PLOTTERS_DESCRIPTION: As your level increases, so does the amount of Land Plots you can own. A Beacon Plotter is a crafted device for extending your bases using earned Land Plots.
GUI_TIP_BECOMING_A_MAYOR_DESCRIPTION: The Citizen with the highest Prestige rating within a Settlement becomes Warden of that Settlement.
GUI_TIP_BLOCK_EXPLOIT_SUSPECTED_DESCRIPT: Placing and breaking the same Blocks over and over does not give you more XP or additional Item Drops.
GUI_TIP_BLOCK_OWNERSHIP_DESCRIPTION: Red highlighted Blocks are owned by other Citizens, orange highlighted Blocks are unclaimed and green highlighted Blocks are owned by you.
GUI_TIP_BLOCK_PATTERN_DIRECTION_DESCRIPT: How Blocks are placed impacts the direction of their pattern. Try placing Blocks both on top of and to the side of other Blocks to see the difference.
GUI_TIP_BREAKING_BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION: Look at the Warp Conduit then press ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to break the Conduit Blocks with your Totem.
GUI_TIP_BREAKING_TREE_BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION: Strike Trees with your Totem to release and collect Trunks. Use ${ACTION(ITEM_PREVIOUS,PLAYING)} and ${ACTION(ITEM_NEXT,PLAYING)} to cycle between your Equipped Items.
GUI_TIP_BREAK_BLOCKS_WITH_WEAPON_DESCRIP: Using a Weapon to break a Block destroys both the Block and any Drops it contains. Tools, however, safely release Block Drops for collection.
GUI_TIP_BREW_BUFFS_DESCRIPTION: Some Brews give you temporary Buffs. Drink the same Brew again to refresh Buff duration or drink a Different brew to replace the current Buff with a different one.
GUI_TIP_BUILDING_IN_BEACON_DESCRIPTION: Can't place an Item? Move closer to your Campfire or Beacon with an object equipped. Place the object in a green highlighted area. Red and Orange highlighted areas are not protected by your base.
GUI_TIP_BUILDING_TIP_TOWER_DESCRIPTION: It's easy to build one Block wide towers! Look straight down then jump and place a Block. Repeat to add more Blocks and see how high you can build.
GUI_TIP_BUMP_AN_OPEN_WARP_DESCRIPTION: Warps don't always open to safe places, but you can interact with a Warp and select 'Bump Warp' to open the Warp to a random nearby safe location.
GUI_TIP_BUYING_AWAY_FROM_GAME_DESCRIPTIO: Citizens can sell requested Items to your Request Baskets, even while you are away.
GUI_TIP_BUYING_PLINTH_SELLING_DESCRIPTIO: Face a Request Basket and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to open it. Place the requested Item into the Basket and select Confirm to sell the Item.
GUI_TIP_BUYING_PLINTH_SETUP_DESCRIPTION: Face your Request Basket and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)}. Move a wanted Item to a Slot, assign the price you're willing to pay and store Coin in the Budget. Your Buyer receives stored Coin in return for your wanted Item.
GUI_TIP_CAMPFIRE_EXPIRED_DESCRIPTION: A Campfire has expired leaving its contents vulnerable to World Regeneration and looting. Your Plots have been returned to your Inventory.
GUI_TIP_CAMPFIRE_USES_DESCRIPTION: Campfires allow you to build and use Machines away from home. The contents of the base are vulnerable once the Campfire expires.
GUI_TIP_CHARGED_ATTACK_DESCRIPTION: Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to charge up your Slingbow. Release to perform a Charge Attack.
GUI_TIP_CHAT_FILTER_DESCRIPTION: You can set filters on the chat window to specify what type of messages will appear on your chat window. Simply select the filter at the top of the chat window and choose the type of messages you want to see.
GUI_TIP_CHAT_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: You can use the chat window to see messages from other Citizens on your current world and send messages to all nearby Citizens by using the say section. Type a message in the say section or start you message with /s or /say to send a message to all nearby Citizens.
GUI_TIP_COLLECTING_ITEMS_DESCRIPTION: Resources, Items and Technologies are abundant throughout the Known Worlds. Most need to be released before collecting. Collect Drops and mined Items by walking up to them; these will appear in your Inventory.
GUI_TIP_COLLECT_FOOTFALL_DESCRIPTION: When another Citizen enters one of your Settlement Beacons you earn Coin.The amount of Coin you earn reduces over time if you do not visit your Settlement Beacons regularly.
GUI_TIP_COLOURED_BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION: Different coloured Blocks can be found throughout the Worlds. Use them to make your builds unique!
GUI_TIP_COMPACTING_FUEL_DESCRIPTION: You can use the compactor to convert basic fuel into a more durable version which can be used for better efficiency and to generate more spark.
GUI_TIP_COMPASS_CREATURES_ICON_DESCRIPTI: On the Compass grey dots indicate neutral Creatures, yellow hostile, red attacking and black show defeated Creatures with uncollected Drops.
GUI_TIP_COMPASS_HOME_ICON_DESCRIPTION: Your Home Beacon appears as an orange house on the Compass.
GUI_TIP_COMPASS_PLAYERS_ICON_DESCRIPTION: Nearby Citizens can be seen on the Compass as a red player icon and nearby friends as a green player icon.
GUI_TIP_COMPASS_SETTLEMENT_ICONS_DESCRIP: Settlements appear as grey Glyphs on the Compass. The Glyph type represents what kind of Settlement it is.
GUI_TIP_CONTENTS_DESCRIPTION: Store Items in a Machine by moving them into the Machine's Contents Storage. Recipes use Ingredients from Machine Storage before those in your Inventory.
GUI_TIP_CRAFTING_AWAY_FROM_GAME_DESCRIPT: Crafts in your Recipe Queue will continue to craft while you are away.
GUI_TIP_CRAFTING_COLOURS_DESCRIPTION: Some crafted Items inherit the colour of the Ingredients used to make them.
GUI_TIP_CRAFTING_TABLE_DESCRIPTION: Craft more, do more! Crafting Tables are a type of Machine used to make sophisticated Recipes which cannot be handcrafted.
GUI_TIP_CRAFTING_TIMER_TIP_DESCRIPTION: Different Recipes craft at different rates. Rather than waiting, explore! Gather Resources, improve your Beacons or complete Objectives and Feats.
GUI_TIP_CRAFTING_WITH_MACHINES_DESCRIPTI: Look at the Crafting Table and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)}. Select the Recipes tab, then click on a Recipe and choose a craft option. Ingredients are taken first from Crafting Table Storage then your Inventory. Recipes currently crafting appear in the Queue tab until complete.
GUI_TIP_CREATURE_GLYPHS_DESCRIPTION: A Glyph above a Creature represents its species type.
GUI_TIP_CREEPING_CONTROLS_DESCRIPTION: Hold ${ACTION(CREEP,PLAYING)} to Creep. Creeping slows your Movement Speed and prevents falling.
GUI_TIP_DAMAGE_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: A creature can deal Kinetic or Impulse damage depending on the type of attack. Physical attacks are Kinetic and explosive attacks are Impulse. You can upgrade your Skills to become more resistant to one or both of these damage types.
GUI_TIP_DANGEROUS_AREA_DESCRIPTION: There are high-level Creatures on this World. You may need to improve your Skills to defeat them. Be prepared before you enter.
GUI_TIP_DANGEROUS_ATMOSPHERE_DESCRIPTION: The Atmosphere on this World is highly dangerous, you will need a certain Skill or Brew to survive. Be prepared before you enter.
GUI_TIP_DEATH_PENALTY_DESCRIPTION: When you are defeated Items in your Inventory lose Durability. Accept Revives from other Citizens or upgrade your Survival Skills to improve Durability.
GUI_TIP_DIRECT_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: A PM is a private message between you and another Citizen when you are on the same world. Start the message with @ in the chat window followed by the citizen you wish to contact and the message you would like to send them.
GUI_TIP_DOUBLE_JUMP_DESCRIPTION: Press ${ACTION(JUMP,PLAYING)} whilst jumping to perform an Air Jump.
GUI_TIP_DROWNING_DESCRIPTION: You are running out of air, when it expires your Health will drain. Swim to the surface to refresh your Air before your Health reaches zero.
GUI_TIP_EATING_FOOD_DESCRIPTION: Consume Food regularly to replenish your Max Energy and avoid low Energy.
GUI_TIP_ELEMENTAL_CREATURES_DESCRIPTION: Across the universe there are creatures that have been exposed to the radiation from Gems and have become attuned to the elements. These creatures are more powerful than normal creatures and deal elemental damage.
GUI_TIP_ELEMENTAL_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Certain items and Creatures can contain unique powers from a particular element. Each element has a element it is strong and weak against, try to out the different combinations to see what works well against the other Elements.
GUI_TIP_EMOTES_DESCRIPTION: Try acting out an emote by typing the emote in the chat window like /wave or by selecting an emote from the emote list. To access the emote list select the bottom left icon of the chat window and select emote.
GUI_TIP_ENGINES_DESCRIPTION: Place a Power Coil next to a matching machine to add power to the machine. You can add additional Power Coils to increase the amount of power applied to the connected machine.
GUI_TIP_EQUIPPING_OBJECTS_DESCRIPTION: Citizens have the ability to quick equip several objects at once. Open your Inventory ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)}${ACTION(OPEN_INVENTORY_PAD,PLAYING)} and place the Warp Conduit Block in your left hand.
GUI_TIP_EQUIPPING_THE_CAMPFIRE_DESCRIPTI: Open the Inventory ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)}${ACTION(OPEN_INVENTORY_PAD,PLAYING)} and assign the Campfire to a hand. When holding the Campfire press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to place it.
GUI_TIP_EXTRA_CHAT_CONTROLS_DESCRIPTION: If you wish to reply to a Citizen or report them, you can do so by selecting their username in the chat window and then selecting the corresponding option.
GUI_TIP_EXTRA_CHAT_CONTROLS_TITLE: Select Players In The Chat Window
GUI_TIP_FALL_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Falling can be fatal. The Damage you take depends on how far you fall; be cautious, particularly near cliff edges!
GUI_TIP_FEATS_DESCRIPTION: Feats track your lifetime accomplishments in the Universe and provide rewards for reaching certain milestones.
GUI_TIP_FOCUS_BREW_SKILL_DESCRIPTION: Focus Brews turn accumulated Focus into temporary Focus abilities. Unlock Focus Skills in the Skill Tree before consuming a Focus Brew to convert generated Focus.
GUI_TIP_FOCUS_GENERATION_DESCRIPTION: The more Damage you deal, the more Focus you generate. Accrued Focus is converted into special abilities when you consume Focus Brews.
GUI_TIP_FOOD_BUFFS_DESCRIPTION: Certain Foods provide you with temporary Buffs. Eating the same Food again refreshes the Buff duration, whilst eating a different meal replaces your current Buff with a new one.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_BOONS_DESCRIPTION: The items you have used have resulted in a Boon being applied to the item. Boons are positive effects on an item which can improve the use and effective of the item.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_CONDITION_DESCRIPTION: Ingredients you add can reduce an item's stability. When the stability runs out the forge will fail and you'll lose the item. Try using other ingredients which can improve an item's stability it is running low.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_DEFECTS_DESCRIPTION: The items you have used have resulted in a Defect being applied to the item. Defects can impact the items use and effectiveness, but in combination with Boons and Quirks the Defect might prove to be useful.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_DESCRIPTION: The Centraforge is a complex crafting machine which requires Skill and knowledge to modify items effectively. It requires a wieldable item and various forging ingredients to begin.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: The condition of the item you were forging has become unstable and has been destroyed.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_FINISH_DESCRIPTION: When you wish to end the forging process and collect the forged item, you'll need to add a Resin to the forge and perform another Round.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_INGREDIENTS_DESCRIPTION: There are many forging ingredients which have different uses and effectiveness. Take a look at an ingredient details panel to see what it does, how much vigour it requires and how it affects an item's stability.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_INGREDIENT_EFFECTS_DESCRIP: The ingredients you have selected will affect the Forge in different ways. Make sure you check out the ingredients information to see what it can do.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_INPUTS_DESCRIPTION: Add the item you wish to modify to the Forge Item section, then add the ingredients to the Ingredients Deck. A Resin needs to be added to the deck as you'll need it to complete the forge.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_OUTPUTS_DESCRIPTION: Items you have successfully forged are sent to the Forge output section for you to claim.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_QUEUE_DESCRIPTION: Items you have forged require time to stabilise and set before you can collect them. When this process is complete the item is sent to the Centraforge Output.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_QUIRKS_DESCRIPTION: The items you have used have resulted in a quirk being applied to the item. Now, depending on your perspective, a quirk can be a positive or negative effect on an item.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_STATS_DESCRIPTION: Flex is...Power is... and Int is... [PLACEHOLDER]
GUI_TIP_FORGE_STATUS_EFFECT_DESCRIPTION: The items you have used have resulted in a Status Effect being applied to the forge at the top of the menu. Each status effect has different effects which you can see when you highlight the effect in the forge.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_TURNS_DESCRIPTION: Each time you add an ingredient to the forge you'll need to perform a round. A round will take the ingredient and apply it to the forge, the results of the ingredient will be shown after you've performed a round.
GUI_TIP_FRIENDS_MENU_DESCRIPTION: The Friends tab shows information about your friends and their status. To add more friends, interact with them or add them to your Steam friend list.
GUI_TIP_FUELLING_YOUR_BEACON_DESCRIPTION: Beacon Fuel is a crafted Item used to activate and power Beacons. To add Beacon Fuel, look at your Beacon Control and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to view the Menu, then add your crafted Fuel to a slot in the Fuel tab. If the Beacon expires its contents become vulnerable to other Players and World Regeneration.
GUI_TIP_FUEL_BEACON_DESCRIPTION: Add Fuel to your Beacon Control to activate it and claim Land Plots.
GUI_TIP_FUEL_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Across the universe there are many forms of fuel which all have different efficiencies. Try using Peaty Soil, Trunks, Timber and the different types of Coal to see their effects.
GUI_TIP_FURNACE_DESCRIPTION: The Furnace needs fuel for crafting. To craft, place Fuel into the Fuel Slot and Ingredients into the Crafting Slot before selecting Start Furnace.
GUI_TIP_GEM_LOCATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Gems are a rare crafting item found only on specific Elemental Worlds.
GUI_TIP_GRAPPLE_CONTROLS_DESCRIPTION:
Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to fire the Grapple.
Press ${ACTION(GRAPPLE_BOTH_WIND_IN,GRAPPLE_BASE)} to ascend
Press ${ACTION(GRAPPLE_BOTH_WIND_OUT,GRAPPLE_BASE)} to descend.
Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} again to release.
GUI_TIP_HANDCRAFTING_RECIPES_DESCRIPTION: Ready to craft? Open the Inventory ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)}${ACTION(OPEN_INVENTORY_PAD,PLAYING)}, select Handcraft then choose a Recipe to Instant Craft; the Item will be added to your Inventory. Uncraftable Recipe? Scavenge for Resources before returning to the Handcraft Menu.
GUI_TIP_HARVESTING_ITEMS_FROM_CREATURES_: Creature defeated! Hit the defeated Creature with a Tool or Weapon to harvest drops.
GUI_TIP_HEALTHBAR_COLOURS_DESCRIPTION: The colour indicates the amount of health a Citizen or creature has. The order of colour from highest to lowest is green, blue.
GUI_TIP_HEALTHBAR_SEGMENT_DESCRIPTION: Each segment of the health bar indicates the amount of health a Citizen or Creature has and amount of health per segments depends on the health bar's colour.
GUI_TIP_HIT_ACTIVE_METEORITE_DESCRIPTION: Meteorites can be mined once dormant. Deactivate them by defeating all creatures arriving through the Meteorite's Portals.
GUI_TIP_HOLDING_FORGED_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: The item has been Centraforge and contains a single or multiple Boons, Quirks and Defects which can change how the item performs, how it affects you and other interesting combinations.
GUI_TIP_HOOKSHOT_CONTROLS_DESCRIPTION: Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to fire the Hookshot.\nPress ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} again to release.
GUI_TIP_HOSTILE_CREATURES_DESCRIPTION: Certain Creatures are hostile and will attack if you get too close. Want to avoid combat? Move away from the Creature before it starts attacking you.
GUI_TIP_HUNGRY_WARNING_DESCRIPTION: Performing actions increases Hunger which limits your maximum Energy. Consume food to reduce Hunger and restore Max Energy.
GUI_TIP_INTERACT_WITH_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTIO: To interact with another Citizen turn to face them and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)}. When both Players have accepted the Interaction, the Trade Menu will open.
GUI_TIP_ITEMS_TO_COLLECT_DESCRIPTION: Some items have been recovered and added to your items collection list.
GUI_TIP_ITEM_AUGMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Augments provide temporary upgrades to an item when they are equipped. To add an Augment to an item select the Augment in your inventory and move it on to the item you wish to add it to.
GUI_TIP_ITEM_DESTROYED_DESCRIPTION: The ${ITEM} you were using has lost all Durability and has been destroyed.
GUI_TIP_ITEM_EJECT_DESCRIPTION: You can eject an augment from an item by selecting the item in your inventory and pressing [input].
GUI_TIP_ITEM_NEEDS_A_BEACON_DESCRIPTION: Certain Blocks or objects can only be placed inside a Beacon which you own or are a member of.
GUI_TIP_ITEM_TOO_WEAK_DESCRIPTION: The Tool you are using is too weak. Try acquiring a higher-quality Tool to break the Block.
GUI_TIP_KNOWLEDGE_DESCRIPTION: Fountain of great insight into the Boundless universe. Consult the Knowledge frequently to learn about items you've discovered and what recipes you've unlocked.
GUI_TIP_KNOWLEDGE_UPDATED_DESCRIPTION: The Knowledge has been updated. Open the Character Menu and select Knowledge to see the newly added information.
GUI_TIP_LEDGE_CLIMB_DESCRIPTION: Jump towards the edge of a Block to perform a Ledge Climb.
GUI_TIP_LOCATION_PICKER_DESCRIPTION: Orbiting above are the Known Worlds, ready for exploration. Look at the World above you, then hold\n${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to jettison the Warp Augment and set your Landing Site. Warp Augments are one-shot Items, destroyed on impact.
GUI_TIP_LOW_DURABILITY_DESCRIPTION: When you are defeated, Items in your Inventory lose Durability. Accept Revives from other Citizens or upgrade your Survival Skills to improve Durability.
GUI_TIP_MACHINE_DURABILITY_LOW_DESCRIPTI: This well-used Machine needs maintenance. Use a Spanner on the Machine to carry out repairs.
GUI_TIP_MACHINE_WORN_OUT_DESCRIPTION: This Machine is overused; it cannot function without maintenance. Equip and use a Spanner on the Machine to carry out repairs.
GUI_TIP_MANTLE_DESCRIPTION: You have reached the World's core. No Tool can break Mantle.
GUI_TIP_MASTER_BEACON_REMOVE_ERROR_DESCR: To remove a Master Beacon Control first remove any connected Plots and Secondary Beacon Controls placed within the Master Beacon area.
GUI_TIP_MASTER_BEACON_REMOVE_WARNING_DES: When you destroy a Master Beacon Control its controlled area returns to being unclaimed. Beacon contents become vulnerable to other Citizens and World Regeneration.
GUI_TIP_MERGING_SETTLEMENTS_DESCRIPTION: This beacon bridges two or more separate Settlements and cannot merge because the connection between the Settlements is too small.
GUI_TIP_NEGATIVE_STATUS_EFFECT_DESCRIPTI: You have been hit with a negative Status Effect. Use certain Brews or Recharger Bombs to remove these effects or wait for them to expire.
GUI_TIP_NEW_OBJECTIVE_DESCRIPTION: A new Objective is available. Press ${ACTION(OPEN_OBJECTIVES,PLAYING)} to open the Journal and view new Objectives.
GUI_TIP_NIGHT_TIME_LIGHT_DESCRIPTION: Brighten a dark spot by holding a Torch or Light Cube. You can handcraft Torches using a few basic Ingredients.
GUI_TIP_OBJECTIVES_DESCRIPTION: Objectives are short term missions which can be completed for rewards and knowledge. View complete and unpinned Objectives in the Objectives tab.
GUI_TIP_ONE_HAND_SWAPPING_DESCRIPTION: You can choose to cycle Radial Menu objects in one or both hands using the Item Selection Radial Switching selector in the Settings Menu.
GUI_TIP_PLACES_BEACONS_DESCRIPTION: The Beacons tab tracks your Beacons and displays their most recent status for your to view. Each Beacon can be used as a Warp Destination.
GUI_TIP_PLACES_LOCATIONS_DESCRIPTION: You can add a location to your Locations list at any time in the Locations tab. Added Locations can be used as Compass Destinations, to craft Location Markers for other Citizens or as Warp Destinations.
GUI_TIP_PLACES_SETTLEMENTS_DESCRIPTION: The Settlements tab tracks the Settlements you have visited. It shows the current Settlement Governor, Prestige value and other information.
GUI_TIP_PLACES_WORLDS_DESCRIPTION: The Worlds tab displays information about the Worlds you have visited including the top Settlements and Archlord on each World.
GUI_TIP_PLACING_BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION: Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} to place the Warp Conduit Block.
GUI_TIP_PLANET_GLYPHS_DESCRIPTION: Each World has a Glyph which indicates its difficulty level; the fewer the dots, the harder the world.
GUI_TIP_PLANET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION: In the Inventory try placing a Resource on top of the Atlas to highlight where that Resource can be found. Lighter areas indicate a higher density of the Resource.
GUI_TIP_PLANET_SCANNER_EJECT_DESCRIPTION: In the Inventory, Press X on the Atlas to stop Resource Scanning. You will need an empty Inventory Slot for the Resource to return to. Try adding different Resources to the Atlas to discover where in the World you can find them.
GUI_TIP_PLANET_VIEWER_DESCRIPTION: Equip the Atlas then use it to synchronise it to your current World. Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to get a closer look at the World and see Regions that you've already discovered.
GUI_TIP_PLANTING_GRASS_DESCRIPTION: Placing Seed on a Soil Block plants Grass. Place multiple Seeds on the same Block to increase the amount of Grass.
GUI_TIP_PLAYER_GLYPHS_DESCRIPTION: The Glyph above your Health Bar represents your Citizen's current level. Other Citizens' levels are shown as a Glyph above their name.
GUI_TIP_PLOT_VIEW_TOGGLE_DESCRIPTION: Press ${ACTION(TOGGLE_BUILDER_MODE,PLAYING)} to toggle Beacon Plot visibility. Builder Mode allows you to view Plot outlines to see which areas have and have not been plotted. Plots with black outlines belong to other Players.
GUI_TIP_POOR_CONNECTION_DESCRIPTION: The connection quality is low. Try reducing your Chunk Download Rate in the Settings Menu and see if your connection improves.
GUI_TIP_PORTAL_STASIS_DESCRIPTION: Travelling through Warps or Portals can cause a temporary side effect which temporarily limits your abilities.
GUI_TIP_POSITIVE_STATUS_EFFECT_DESCRIPTI: You have been hit with a positive Status Effect. The effects are temporary and will expire when the timer runs out.
GUI_TIP_POWER_CORE_DESCRIPTION: Spark Generators provide Spark to high-tier Machines. Place and Fuel a Spark Generator to generate Spark then use Spark Link to connect a Machines and Spark Generator.
GUI_TIP_PROFILE_MENU_DESCRIPTION: Use the Profile Menu to view detailed information about your various Attributes and Statistics.
GUI_TIP_QUEUE_DESCRIPTION: Queue up to 20 Recipes in a Machine at once! Crafts are added to the Queue until complete. Active Recipes can be cancelled in the Queue tab; unused Items are returned to you.
GUI_TIP_QUICK_APPLY_AUGMENT_DESCRIPTION: You can quickly swap augments without going into your inventory if you hold the augment in your hand. When you hold an augment in one hand and a valid item on the other you can use the augment and instantly adde it to the held item.
GUI_TIP_QUICK_EQUIP_DESCRIPTION: When viewing your Inventory or interacting with a Machine you can use ${ACTION(RUN,PLAYING)} and ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to quickly move Items.
GUI_TIP_RADIAL_MENU_CONTROLS_DESCRIPTION:
Hold ${ACTION(OPEN_QUICK_USE,PLAYING)} to open Radial Menu
Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to control left or right radials.
Release ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to equip highlighted Item.
Use ${ACTION(ITEM_PREVIOUS_NEXT,PLAYING)} to cycle through Items.
GUI_TIP_RAGE_BREW_SKILL_DESCRIPTION: Rage Brews turn accumulated Rage into temporary Rage abilities. Unlock your Rage Skills in the Skill Tree before consuming a Rage Brew to convert generated Rage.
GUI_TIP_RAGE_GENERATION_DESCRIPTION: The more Damage you receive, the more Rage you generate. Accrued Rage is converted into special abilities when you use Rage Brews.
GUI_TIP_RAPID_FIRE_DESCRIPTION: Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to perform Rapid Fire with a Slingbow.
GUI_TIP_RECIPES_DESCRIPTION: Each Recipe details the Ingredients required to craft a particular Item. Improve your crafting Skills with Skill Points to unlock more Recipes. You can also visit the Knowledge page in the Character menu to see other recipes.
GUI_TIP_REGENERATE_BURST_STAMINA_DESCRIP: Each time you use a Tool or Weapon your Energy is temporarily depleted. When you run out of Energy you'll need to wait for it to recharge.
GUI_TIP_REGENERATE_HEALTH_DESCRIPTION: Damage reduces Health Points if you let them drop to zero you will be defeated. Consume Brews or Food to restore Health.
GUI_TIP_REPLAY_TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: Welcome back! It seems like you haven't played for a while and might need a refresher. Would you like to replay the Tutorial? Select the tutorial in the objectives menu and choose the replay option.
GUI_TIP_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: You can use the Report menu to report bugs you have found, user generated content in the world or other players.
GUI_TIP_RESTRICTED_AREA_DESCRIPTION: You cannot alter this area. Green highlighted areas show your land, red another Citizen's or restricted area and orange is unclaimed. You cannot place Blocks directly beneath you.
GUI_TIP_RESURRECTION_COOLDOWN_DESCRIPTIO: Reviving Citizens takes considerable Energy. Your Totem takes time to Recharge before you can use it again.
GUI_TIP_REVIVE_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTION: Use a Totem fitted with a Revive Augment to revive a defeated Citizen. Fire the Revive Augment at them to Revive them.
GUI_TIP_ROTATE_MACHINES_DESCRIPTION: Machines, Furnishings and other decorative fixtures can be rotated by hitting them with a Chisel.
GUI_TIP_SELLING_AWAY_FROM_GAME_DESCRIPTI: Items in your Shop Stands are always available for sale, even while you are away.
GUI_TIP_SELLING_PLINTH_BUYING_DESCRIPTIO: Face a Shop Stand and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to open it. Place any Items you wish to purchase into your Basket then select Confirm to spend your Coin.
GUI_TIP_SELLING_PLINTH_SETUP_DESCRIPTION: Face your Shop Stand and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to open it. Add the Item type you wish to sell then set the price of the Item in the Price List.
GUI_TIP_SERVER_MAINTENANCE_DESCRIPTION: The Boundless server will be undergoing maintenance on ${DAY} ${DAY_NO} of ${MONTH} at ${24HOUR} (UTC). During this time, play will be suspended. ${DURATION}
GUI_TIP_SERVER_MAINTENANCE_DURATION: Maintenance is estimated to complete at ${DURATION_24HOUR} (UTC).
GUI_TIP_SERVER_MAINTENANCE_UNDER_HOUR_DE: The Boundless server will be undergoing maintenance in ${MINUTES} minutes. All play will be suspended at this time. ${DURATION}
GUI_TIP_SETTLEMENT_CAPITAL_DESCRIPTION: The most prestigious Settlement on a world is designated as the Capital. This is usually where most Citizens gather on the world to trade, meet up and socialise.
GUI_TIP_SETTLEMENT_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: There are multiple rankings of a settlement based on its prestige; the more prestigious a settlement is the higher it's ranking. The ranking starts from Outpost then moves on to Hamlet, Village, Town and finally City.
GUI_TIP_SET_LANDMARK_DESCRIPTION: You can track Saved Location on the Compass by selecting a location in the Places Menu then choosing Set Waypoint.
GUI_TIP_SET_LANDMARK_TITLE: Setting A Landmark On The Compass
GUI_TIP_SHARING_LOCATIONS_DESCRIPTION: You can share Saved Locations with others. Craft a Location Marker in the Places Menu then give it to another Citizen to add to their Saved Locations.
GUI_TIP_SHOUT_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: You can send a message to everyone on your current world by starting your message with /sh or /shout.
GUI_TIP_SKILLS_MENU_DESCRIPTION: Each time your level increases you earn Skill Points which can be used to acquire new Skills, Abilities and Attributes in the Skills tab.
GUI_TIP_SKILL_POINTS_DESCRIPTION: Skill Points (SP) are awarded each time you level up. Spend SP in the Skill Menu to upgrade your Citizen. Open the Options Menu ${ACTION(TOGGLE_MENU,PLAYING)} then select Character to access the Skills Menu.
GUI_TIP_SKILL_POINT_AVAILABLE_DESCRIPTIO: You have unspent Skill Points. Press ${ACTION(OPEN_PROGRESSION,PLAYING)} to open the Character Menu and assign Skill Points in the Skills tab.
GUI_TIP_SMART_STACKING_ITEMS_AND_SPLITTI: In the Inventory, place matching Items on top of each other to Stack them. Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to split a Stack, use ${ACTION(GENERAL_LOOKAT,PLAYING)} to choose the amount to split and release ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to pick up the selected amount.
GUI_TIP_SMART_STACK_DESCRIPTION: When you have multiple Stacks or Items of the same type, a Smart Stack is created in your Inventory.
GUI_TIP_SPARK_CORD_LIMIT_DESCRIPTION: The Spark Link can only transfer Spark for a short distance from Spark Generator to Machine. Move your Machine and Spark Generator closer to connect them.
GUI_TIP_SPARK_CORES_LIMIT_DESCRIPTION: You have reached the maximum number of Spark Generators which can be connected. Any future Spark Generators placed will not be connected to the current group.
GUI_TIP_STACKING_ITEMS_AND_SPLITTING_DES: Press ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} on a Smart Stack to view its contents.
GUI_TIP_START_WORLD_FAILED_TO_CONNECT_DE: Your current World is unavailable. Please try again later or visit a different World using the closed Warp Conduit in the sanctum.
GUI_TIP_STORAGE_BOX_DESCRIPTION: A Storage Box or Shelf can be used to store Items. Place multiple Storage units next to each other to expand your Storage space.
GUI_TIP_SUFFOCATING_DESCRIPTION: You are running out of air, when it expires your Health will drain. Leave this planet to refresh your Air before your Health reaches zero.
GUI_TIP_SWITCHING_CHAT_CONTROLS_DESCRIPT: You can default your chat window into a specific chat mode by selecting the panel from the bottom left icon in the chat window. This means any future message will send the message to the selected chat mode by default.
GUI_TIP_TEMPORARY_CAMPFIRE_DESCRIPTION: Campfires temporarily claim an area of land and protect Items placed within it from outside dangers. Once burnt out, the contents of the Campfire become vulnerable to other Players and World Regeneration.
GUI_TIP_TIMBER_AND_STICKS_DESCRIPTION: Turn your Trunks into Timber and discover a basic yet versatile Ingredient for crafting Tools, Weapons and other Items.
GUI_TIP_TIMBER_DESCRIPTION: Timber, handcrafted from Tree Trunks, essential for increased crafting power. Sturdy, uncomplicated and the core Ingredient for making a Crafting Table.
GUI_TIP_TIPS_DESCRIPTION: Can't remember the what to do? Check the tips to find out how things work in the Boundless universe. Each tip you learn will be added to the tips for you to review later.
GUI_TIP_TOO_MANY_MESH_BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION: There are too many Props placed in this area; if you wish to add new Props, you will need to remove some existing ones first.
GUI_TIP_TRACKER_DESCRIPTION: Use the Pinned tab in the Journal Menu to track a small number of Objectives.
GUI_TIP_UPGRADING_TOOLS_DESCRIPTION: Press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)}${ACTION(OPEN_INVENTORY_PAD,PLAYING)} to open the Inventory. Combine the Totem with the Warp Augment.
GUI_TIP_USE_AXE_FOR_TREES_DESCRIPTION: Axes are best suited for chopping down organic Blocks such as Wood, Trunks, Foliage and Plants.
GUI_TIP_USE_BOMBS_FOR_COMBAT_DESCRIPTION: Bombs have multiple uses in combat. Throw Ruiners at enemies to deal Damage and Rechargers at allies to restore Health or Energy.
GUI_TIP_USE_HAMMER_FOR_ROCK_DESCRIPTION: Hammers are best suited for breaking Rocks, Seams and other strong Blocks. Harder materials need stronger Hammers to break them.
GUI_TIP_USE_LANCE_FOR_COMBAT_DESCRIPTION: Lances are close-range Weapons ideal for melee combat. Craft or purchase stronger Lances to deal more Damage.
GUI_TIP_USE_SHOVEL_FOR_DIRT_DESCRIPTION: Shovels are best suited for collecting Soil, Gravel, Sand and other earth-like Blocks. Higher-tier Shovels are more durable.
GUI_TIP_USE_SLINGBOW_FOR_COMBAT_DESCRIPT: Slingbows are long-range Weapons ideal for targeting Creatures from afar. Upgrade to stronger Slingbow types to deal more Damage.
GUI_TIP_USING_EQUIPPED_ITEMS_DESCRIPTION: Left in the dark? When holding the Light Cube press \n${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} to light your way.
GUI_TIP_VERY_HUNGRY_WARNING_DESCRIPTION: Performing actions increases Hunger which limits your maximum Energy. Consume food to reduce Hunger and restore Max Energy.
GUI_TIP_WARPS_EXPLANATION_DESCRIPTION: Warps provide a one-way travel solution for reaching Places in your Locations, Beacons, Friends and Settlements Lists quickly. Once entered, Warps close behind the Citizen. Lost or in a sticky situation? Use the ${ACTION(TOGGLE_MENU,PLAYING)} Menu to return to the sanctum at any time.
GUI_TIP_WARP_CONDUITS_DESCRIPTION: The speedy answer to travelling the Known Worlds. Obtained through craft or trade, Warp Conduit Blocks are used to build Warp Conduits, allowing fast travel to Places added in your Locations, Beacons, Settlements and Friends Lists.
GUI_TIP_WARP_DESTINATION_DESCRIPTION: Your Warp Conduit is complete. Look at the Conduit then press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to interact with it and activate a Warp to your chosen destination.
GUI_TIP_WEAKENED_DESCRIPTION: After being defeated your body is temporarily weakened causing your Attributes bonuses to be reduced.
GUI_TIP_WHAT_IS_A_SELLING_PLINTH_DESCRIP: A Shop Stand allows Citizens to place Items up for sale for others to purchase with Coin.
GUI_TIP_WHAT_IS_BUYING_PLINTH_DESCRIPTIO: A Request Basket allows Citizens to exchange specific Items for Coin.
GUI_TIP_WHERE_TO_FIND_ROCKS_DESCRIPTION: Rocks, the tough alternative to Wood. Found on the side of mountains or underground, Rocks are best released using a Hammer. Trapped? Choose 'RETURN TO THE SANCTUM' in the Options Menu ${ACTION(TOGGLE_MENU,PLAYING)}.
GUI_TIP_WORLD_FULL_DESCRIPTION: The World you are trying to connect to is full. Please try again later or visit a different World using the closed Warp Conduit in the sanctum.
GUI_TIP_WORLD_OFFLINE_DESCRIPTION: The World you are trying to connect to is unavailable. Try again later or visit another World using the closed Warp Conduit in the sanctum.
GUI_TIP_WORLD_REGENERATION_DESCRIPTION: Block placed on unclaimed land. Worlds regenerate by removing and replacing unprotected Blocks; place a Beacon Control or extend Plots to prevent this.
GUI_TIP_WORLD_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Across the universe there are many worlds to discover. The worlds vary in size, difficulty, creatures and Resources for you to discover.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_ACTION_SPEED_DESCRI: Don't be a slow coach, gain Busy Bee Boon and increase the Speed at which you can use Gear Forged with this Trait by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Action Speed ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_APPLY_SLOW_DESCRIPT: Slow your foes with Slowing Boon, the Trait that slows your targets with a $[STYLE(Lvl ${LEVEL} Slow,1)] Debuff when hit with shots from a Forged Slingbow.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_APPLY_WEAK_DESCRIPT: Weakness Boon, the Trait that Weakens your target's attacks with a $[STYLE(Lvl ${LEVEL} Weakening,1)] Debuff when hit with shots from a Forged Slingbow.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_AREA_OF_EFFECT_DESC: Think big with the Bomb-boosting Boon that increases Area of Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Area Of Effect ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Bombs Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_CHANGE_BLOCK_TYPE_D: Transform a Chisel into a Changer with Transformation Boon. You'll no longer be able to chisel with it, but you may be able to change a Block's type when hitting with it.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_CLEANSING_BOMB_DESC: Debuff your allies with Clean Slate Boon, the Trait that turns Forged Bomb Damage into a Debuff eraser for nearby Citizens.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_CRITICAL_CHANCE_DES: Beat the odds with the Boon that increases Critical Chance by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Critical Chance ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using an Adjusted Weapon or Tool.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_CRITICAL_EFFECT_DES: Hit 'em harder with Boon that improves Critical Hit Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Critical Effect ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using a Weapon or Tool forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: The two-way Damage Increaser. Gives Gear Forged with this Trait a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Damage ${LEVEL} Damage Relative,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage increase as well as adding an extra $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Damage ${LEVEL} Damage Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DAMAGE_OVER_TIME_DE: Leave a lasting impression with Let 'em Bleed Boon and cause a $[STYLE(Lvl ${LEVEL} Bleeding,1)] Debuff that continues to Damage your targets over time when hit with a Forged Slingbow shot.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DIFFICULTY_DESCRIPT: Master faster with Major Mastery Boon! The Trait that reduces Difficulty required when using Forged Gear by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Difficulty ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DROP_ATTRACTION_DES: Collect quicker with the Boon that makes Drops come to you. Attract Drops from $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Drop Attraction ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] further away when holding Gear Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DURABILITY_DESCRIPT: Heavy-duty Boon, for Gear that doesn't give in! Increases the Durability of Gear Forged with this Trait by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Durability ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_EFFECT_ADJACENT_DES: Hit a Block with a Flanker's Force Boon Forged Tool and cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Effect Adjacent 1 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage of a standard hit to that Block and those directly to the right and left of it.
Hit a Block with a Low Blow Boon forged Tool and cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Effect Adjacent 2 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage of a standard hit to that Block and the one directly below it.

Hit a Block with a Tool forged with Cross Purposes Boon and cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Effect Adjacent 3 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage of a standard hit to that Block and those directly above, below and either side of it.

Hit a Block with an All-rounder Boon Forged Tool and cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Effect Adjacent 4 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage of a standard hit to that Block and all eight Blocks directly surrounding it.
Carry out a random act of Blockness with the Boon that causes full-powered Damage to both the Block you are hitting and a number of random Blocks surrounding it.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_GLOW_DESCRIPTION: Glow with the flow with Glow Boon. Allows Gear Forged with this Trait to emit a light with a radius of $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Glow ${LEVEL} Radius,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_HEALING_BOMB_DESCRI: Give your allies a good blast with Hot on Their Heals Boon, the Trait that turns Forged Bomb Damage into restored Health for nearby Citizens.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_HEAVY_PROJECTILE_DE: Increases Projectile Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Heavy Projectile ${LEVEL} Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] whilst slowing Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Heavy Projectile ${LEVEL} Projectile Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Projectile trajectory arc is affected.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_KNOCKBACK_DESCRIPTI: Give your Bombs extra bang with Knockback Boon and increase Knockback distance by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Knockback ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Bombs Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_LENGTH_DESCRIPTION: Grapple further with Far Reaching Boon, the Trait that increases Forged Grapple Length by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Length ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_LIGHT_PROJECTILE_DE: Makes Projectiles fly lighter and faster with a flatter trajectory. Increases Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Light Projectile ${LEVEL} Projectile Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Slingbows Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_NUMBER_OF_SHOTS_DES: Get two shots for the price of one with Double Shot Boon. Slingbows Forged with this Trait fire $[STYLE(2,1)] shots rather than 1 inflicting $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 1 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage per Projectile.

Triple your efforts with Triple Shot Boon and fire $[STYLE(3,1)] shots rather than 1 when using a Forged Slingbow. Inflicts $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 2 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage per Projectile.

Why fire one shot when you can fire four? Causes Quadruple Shot Boon Forged Slingbows to fire $[STYLE(4,1)] shots with $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 3 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage per Projectile.

Five projectiles in one go! Quintuple Shot Boon causes Slingbows with the Trait to generate $[STYLE(5,1)] shots instead of 1, each inflicting  $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 4 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage.

Be top of the shots with Sextuple Shot Boon. Causes Slingbows forged with this Trait to generate $[STYLE(6,1)] shots instead of 1, each inflicting $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 5 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_PROJECTILE_SPEED_DE: It never hurts to be a little faster. Fly Fast Boon increases the Projectile Speed of Forge-enhanced Slingbows or Grapples by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Projectile Speed ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_RANGE_DESCRIPTION: Become a long-range sharpshooter with the Boon that increases Forged Slingbow Range by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Range ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_REEL_SPEED_DESCRIPT: Reel it in faster with the Boon that increases Forged Grapple Reel In Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Reel Speed ${LEVEL} Reel In Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Also increases Reel Out Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Reel Speed ${LEVEL} Reel Out Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_REGENERATE_WORLD_DE: Talking 'bout Regeneration. Blast an area with Bombs Forged with this Trait and it'll force World Regeneration in that area. Has no effect within Beacons.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_STAMINA_BOMB_DESCRI: Give good Energy with the Trait that turns Forged Bomb Damage into restored Energy for nearby Citizens.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_STAMINA_USE_DESCRIP: Join the Energy saving initiative with Energy Saver Boon! The Gear Adjustment that reduces Energy lost with each use by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Stamina Use ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_WEAR_REMOVED_PER_HI: Repair Wear and tear with ease thanks to Wear Remover Boon the Trait that helps Forged Spanners remove an extra $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Wear Removed Per Hit ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)} Wear Pts per Hit,1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_ACTION_SPEED_DESC: Slow progress is better than no progress with Slow Coach Defect, the Trait that reduces the Speed at which you can use Forged Gear by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Action Speed ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)]
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_AREA_OF_EFFECT_DE: Think small with the debilitating Defect that reduces Area of Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Area Of Effect ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Bombs Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_CRITICAL_CHANCE_D: Draw the unlucky card with the Defect that reduces Critical Hit Chance by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Critical Chance ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using an Adjusted Weapon or Tool.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_CRITICAL_EFFECT_D: Hit 'em softer with the debilitating Defect that reduces Critical Hit Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Critical Effect ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using a Weapon or Tool forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTIO: The two-way Damage decreaser. Applies a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Damage ${LEVEL} Damage Relative,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage reduction as well as removing an extra $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Damage ${LEVEL} Damage Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage to Gear Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_DIFFICULTY_DESCRI: The Defect that makes a mockery of Mastery, increasing Difficulty level by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Difficulty ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Adjusted Gear.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_DURABILITY_DESCRI: Fragile Gear Defect, the Trait that makes Gear less sturdy. Decreases the Durability of Forged Gear by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Durability ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)]$[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Durability ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_KNOCKBACK_DESCRIP: Knockback Defect, the adverse Trait that knocks down Knockbacks by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Knockback ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Forged Bombs.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_LENGTH_DESCRIPTIO: It's not the length of the Grapple but how you use it! Grapple Length Defect decreases Forged Grapple Reach by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Length ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_PROJECTILE_SPEED_: Gets your Projectiles on the go-slow by decreasing the Projectile Speed of Forge-enhanced Slingbows or Grapples by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Projectile Speed ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_RANGE_DESCRIPTION: The Defect that gets you closer to the action by reducing Forged Slingbow Range by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Range ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_REEL_SPEED_DESCRI: Slow down Reel time with the Defect that decreases Reel Out Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reel Speed ${LEVEL} Reel Out Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)] and Reel In Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reel Speed ${LEVEL} Reel In Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)] for Forged Grapples.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_STAMINA_USE_DESCR: An Energy expending Defect that increases the amount of Energy lost by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Stamina Use ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] each time Gear Forged with this Trait is used.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_WEAR_REMOVED_PER_: More Wear, less Repair with Wear Remover Defect, the Trait that reduces Wear Removed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Wear Removed Per Hit ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)} Wear Pts per Hit,1)] when using the Forged Spanner.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_ITEM_QUIRK_FIRE_RANDOMLY: Watch where you're pointing that thing! Forged Gear with this Quirk fires or hits at random when equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_ITEM_QUIRK_MAKES_ODD_SOU: The Quirk that makes Forged Gear sound quirky whenever it's used!
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_BOUNCY_FEET_DESCRI: Feel like you're walking on the Moon with Bouncy Feet Quirk. Every surface will feel like a Trampoline when Forged Gear with this Quirk is equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_CREATURE_AGGRO_RAN: Aggravate the opposition with the Quirk that makes Creatures more likely to attack you when you're holding affected Gear.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_DRAINS_HEALTH_DESC: Pack your Inventory with Healing Brews! Using Forged Gear with Bleeding Edge Quirk constantly drains your Health whilst equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_DRAINS_HUNGER_DESC: Keep plenty of Food to hand when using Forged Gear with this Quirk. It will make you hungrier and hungrier whilst equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_JUMP_RANDOMLY_DESC: They say Look Before You Leap, but you won't have chance with the Quirk that makes you jump at random when holding effected Gear.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_DAY_TIME_DESC: The Quirk for those who seize the day! Causes the Forged Traits of Gear to work only in daylight.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_HIGH_HEALTH_D: For those in the Best of Health. Forged Traits for Gear with this Quirk only apply during times of High Health.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_HIGH_HUNGER_D: When your Citizen's belly is Full Up, the Forged Traits of Gear with this Quirk will apply.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_LOW_HEALTH_DE: How low can you go? Forged Traits for Gear with this Quirk only apply during times of Low Health.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_LOW_HUNGER_DE: Citizen feeling ravenous? They'll need to for the Forged Traits of Gear with this Quirk to work.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_NIGHT_TIME_DE: The Quirk for night owls everywhere, causing the Forged Traits of Gear to apply only when darkness falls.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_SINK_IN_WATER_DESC: Get that sinking feeling with the Forged Gear Quirk that makes you sink in water. Only applies when Forged Gear with this Quirk is equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_SLIPPERY_FEET_DESC: Let it slide with the Quirk that makes every Block seem like Ice when Forged Gear is equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_SLOWS_YOU_DOWN_DES: Make like a Tortoise and take it slowly with Slow-Mo Quirk. You'll always move and act slower when Forged Gear with this Quirk is equipped.
GUI_WARP_BUMP_BUTTON: BUMP WARP\n(Moves Warp to safe location)
GUI_WARP_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to spend ${XXX} Coin opening this Warp? You currently have ${YYY} Coin and may not be able to Warp back.
INFO_BEACON_LOW_FUEL_SUBTITLE: A Beacon is low on Fuel.
INFO_CONSOLE_NOT_PERMITTED: Not allowed to place a Beacon Control here.
INFO_CREATE_INVENTORY_SPACE_SUBTITLE: Create space in the Inventory for the Trading Items
INFO_HAS_CONSOLE: Can't remove Plots containing a Beacon Control.
INFO_INVALID_BLOCK_PLACEMENT_OUTSIDE_BEA: This Block can only be placed within a Beacon.
INFO_INVALID_BLOCK_POSITION_SUBTITLE: There is a creature or player in the way.
INFO_INVALID_ENGINE_POSITION_SUBTITLE: Invalid position for an Power Coil Block
INFO_INVALID_INTERACTION_SUBTITLE: You do not have Permissions within this Beacon.
INFO_INVALID_MACHINE_POSITION_SUBTITLE: Invalid position for a Machine Block
INFO_INVALID_PLOTADD_ALREADY_TAKEN_SUBTI: This area is already taken by another player
INFO_INVALID_PLOTADD_CAMPFIRE_SUBTITLE: Can't add plots to a Campfire
INFO_INVALID_PLOTADD_NOT_ADJACENT_SUBTIT: Plot would not be joined to another plot
INFO_INVALID_PLOTADD_NO_HITS_SUBTITLE: This area isn't part of your Beacon
INFO_INVALID_PLOTADD_NO_PERMISSION_SUBTI: You can't add a plot to another player's Beacon
INFO_INVALID_PLOTADD_NO_PLOTS_TITLE: You don't have any spare plots
INFO_INVALID_PLOTADD_OUT_OF_WORLD_SUBTIT: It's not possible to take a plot here
INFO_INVALID_PLOTREMOVE_CAMPFIRE_SUBTITL: Can't remove plots from a Campfire
INFO_INVALID_PLOTREMOVE_CONTAINS_MASTER_: Destroy the Control to remove the Beacon
You can't unplot the Master Beacon Control
INFO_INVALID_PLOTREMOVE_NO_PERMISSION_SU: You don't have permission to remove this plot
INFO_INVALID_PLOTREMOVE_WOULD_SEPARATE_S: Removing this plot would leave separated plots
INFO_INVALID_PORTAL_POSITION_SUBTITLE: Invalid position for an Portal Conduit Block
INFO_INVALID_PORTAL_TOKEN_SUBTITLE: Portal is no longer valid. Acquire a new Token and try again.
INFO_INVALID_POWERCORE_POSITION_SUBTITLE: Invalid position for a Spark Generator Block
INFO_INVALID_SANCTUM_POSITION_SUBTITLE: Place the Warp Conduit Block on the unfinished Warp Conduit
INFO_INVALID_SIGN_POSITION_SUBTITLE: Invalid position for an sign part
INFO_INVALID_TOOL_TO_BREAK_BLOCK_SUBTITL: Requires Tool of Hardness ${VALUE1} or greater
INFO_INVALID_WARP_POSITION_SUBTITLE: Invalid position for a Warp Conduit Block
INFO_LOCKS_NO_ITEMS_SUBTITLE: Lock does not lock any Items
INFO_LOCKS_ONLY_IN_BEACON_SUBTITLE: Locks only work inside a Beacon or Campfire
INFO_LOCKS_OUTSIDE_BEACON_TITLE: Lock attached to Block outside Beacon
INFO_NOT_CONTIGUOUS: Plot would not be joined vertically to another Plot.
INFO_NO_PERMISSION: You don't have permission to place a Plot here.
INFO_NO_PERMISSIONS_TO_BREAK_BLOCK_SUBTI: You do not have Permissions within this Beacon.
INFO_NO_PERMISSIONS_TO_BREAK_ITEM_SUBTIT: You do not have Permissions within this Beacon.
INFO_NO_PLACEMENT_PERMISSIONS_SUBTITLE: You do not have Permissions within this Beacon.
INFO_NO_PLOTS_FOR_CAMPFIRE_SUBTITLE: Not enough plots to place a campfire, requires ${VALUE1} plots
INFO_OUT_OF_WORLD: It's not possible to take a Plot here.
INFO_REMOVE_MASTER_BEACON_NOT_MAYOR_SUBT: Can only be broken by the Beacon Owner
INFO_REMOVE_MASTER_BEACON_NOT_MAYOR_TITL: You can't break the Master Beacon Control
INFO_REMOVE_MASTER_BEACON_TITLE: You can't break the Master Beacon Control
INFO_TOO_MANY_CONSOLES: Can't put any more Beacon Controls here.
INFO_TOO_MANY_MESH_BLOCKS_SUBTITLE: Too many blocks with meshes in this chunk.
INFO_TRADE_REQUEST_OTHER_SUBTITLE: ${VALUE1} wants to Trade. Interact with them to accept.
INFO_WOULD_SEPARATE: Removing this Plot would leave separated Plots.
ITEM_TYPE_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_COMPONENT_SE: An unusual and ancient Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_DEVICE_SEAM_: A rare ancient Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_FRAGMENT_SEA: An unusual and ancient Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_ASH_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A soft, dark grey Block, which can hinder Movement Speed.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_ACTIONSPEED1_DESC: The Weapon Augment that helps you deploy Bombs more speedily. Add it to a Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase your Bomb Action Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_ACTIONSPEED2_DESC: Deploy Bombs even quicker with this powerful Augment. Crafted with the Adrenal Gland of the speedy Road Runner and stabilising Olivine Fragment to increase your Bomb Action Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_ACTIONSPEED3_DESC: An ultra rare and ultra effective Bomb Augment. Use it to substantially increase the Speed at which you can deploy the Augmented Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_AREAOFEFFECT1_DES: Give your Bombs a bigger boom with an Area of Effect Augment. Utilises an explosive combination of Saltpetre and Sulphur Fragments to increase the size of area affected by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] on detonation.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_AREAOFEFFECT2_DES: Get a bigger bang from your Bombs over a wider area with this extra explosive Augment. Add to any Bag of Bombs to increase the Area of Effect of those Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_AREAOFEFFECT3_DES: Give your Bombs the biggest bang around with this ultra rare and mighty Augment. Increases the Area of Effect of Augmented Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_CRITICALEFFECT1_D: The Bomb Augment that gets Critical results. Add to any Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase your chance of achieving Critical Hits by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_CRITICALEFFECT2_D: The even better Bomb Augment for achieving Critical Hits more often. Use with any Bag of Bombs to increase your chance of Critical Hits by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_CRITICALEFFECT3_D: An extremely rare and powerful Bomb Augment which significantly increases the chance of Critical Hits dealt by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_DAMAGE1_DESCRIPTI: A useful addition to any Bag of Bombs which can be crafted in a Compactor from a few choice Ingredients. Temporarily increases Damage dealt by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_DAMAGE2_DESCRIPTI: A craftable rare Weapon Augment that increases Bomb Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_DAMAGE3_DESCRIPTI: The rarest and most powerful Damage Bomb Augment available. Craft by adding Rocks, Cobalt Fragment and Vicous Blood to a Powered Compactor. Temporarily increases Damage dealt by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_PROJECTILESPEED1_: Pep up your Bombs' Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] with the Augment designed to make your Bombs reach their target quicker. All Augments are temporary.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_PROJECTILESPEED2_: A rare Bomb Augment crafted using the Spark Sac of a Spitter, a Creature known for it's ability to fire fast. Add to any Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase the travelling Speed of those Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_PROJECTILESPEED3_: The rarest, yet speediest option for increasing your Bombs' Projectile Speed. Use with any Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase the speed at which Bombs will reach their target by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_ACTIONSPEED1_: Fire faster than your average Citizen with the Slingbow Augment that increases Fire Rate. Augment is destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_ACTIONSPEED2_: Be an even speedier Shot with the Augment that noticably increases Slingbow Fire Rate. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is lost.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_ACTIONSPEED3_: Fire faster than you can think with the Slingbow Augment that significantly increases Fire Rate. The Augment is destroyed once charge is lost.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_CRITICALEFFEC: Fire with confidence thanks to the Slingbow Augment that slightly increases Critical Effect. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
Fire with even more confidence! This Augment noticeably boosts Critical Effect when combined with a Slingbow. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is lost.
Full force Slingbow firing with the ultra rare Augment that significantly increases Critical Effect. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_DAMAGE1_DESCR: Combine with a Slingbow to cause a little Extra Damage with each Bolt fired. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_DAMAGE2_DESCR: Boosts your Bolt Damage a little more when attached to a Slingbow. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_DAMAGE3_DESCR: Do even more Damage with Bolts when an Augment of this type is attached to a Slingbow. The Augment is destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_MAXLENGTH1_DE: Fire farther using the basic Slingbow Augment that slightly increases Weapon Range. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_MAXLENGTH2_DE: Make your Slingbows longer-range with the Augment that noticeably increases Weapon Range. Augments are temporary and are destroyed once charge is lost.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_MAXLENGTH3_DE: Fire from afar thanks to the ultra rare Augment that significantly increases Slingbow Firing Range. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_PROJECTILESPE: Get your Slingbow Bolts to their Targets faster with a basic Projectile Velocity Augment. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is lost.
The Augment that puts more power behind your Slingbow Bolts making them fly even faster. Augments are temporary and will be destroyed once its charge is lost.
Give your Slingbow Bolts even more momentum with this ultra rare and ultra powerful Augment that significantly increases projectle velocity. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_AGGRAVATING_MEGA_DESCRIPT: A sweet and fragrant Brew which temporarily increases your Threat Rating during combat. Helps to draw Creature attacks away from other Citizens.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CALMING_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: A sweet, slightly floral tasting Brew which temporarily reduces your Threat Rating during combat for a calmer Combat experience.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_GREATER_DESCRIP: Detox with a Greater Cleansing Brew and instantly remove or significantly reduce the duration of Debuffs.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_IMPROVED_DESCRI: Eiminate minor Debuffs and reduce the duration of major Debuffs with this Improved Cleansing Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_MEGA_DESCRIPTIO: Destroy those Debuffs with a Mega Cleansing Brew; the Mega Brew that instantly removes or substantially reduces the duration of Debuffs.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_MINOR_DESCRIPTI: A deep blue Brew which instantly reduces the duration of any Debuffs affecting its drinker.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_SUPER_DESCRIPTI: The deep blue Super Brew that gives its drinker a Super Cleanse, instantly removing or reducing the duration of all levels of Debuff.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_GREATER_DESCRIPTION: A sweet and sour Brew which contains Roadrunner Adrenal Gland to accelerate its drinker's actions.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_IMPROVED_DESCRIPTION: Run faster, act faster with Improved Fast Brew. Its effects are all thanks to the addition of Roadrunner Adrenal Gland.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Gives the consumer a Mega boost of Speed thanks to the power of Roadrunner Adrenal Gland.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_MINOR_DESCRIPTION: Put some pep in your step with the Brew that temporarily makes you run and act faster than before.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_SUPER_DESCRIPTION: Make yourself super speedy with the odd tasting Brew that temporarily gives the consumer Super Speed.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_GREATER_DESCRIPTI: Still bland but even more potent, this Healing Brew restores a greater portion of Health over time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_GREATER_INSTANT_D: The Instant Healing Brew that's even Greater.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_IMPROVED_DESCRIPT: A bland but powerful Brew that partially heals its drinker over time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_IMPROVED_INSTANT_: Perk up a little more with Improved Instant Healing Brew for an instant Health boost.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Be full of vim and vigour with the most potent of slow Healing Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_MEGA_INSTANT_DESC: Feel fully refreshed with the most potent of Instant Healing Brews. Particularly useful in tough Combat situations.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_MINOR_DESCRIPTION: A minor Brew which restores a minor portion of Heatlh over time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_MINOR_INSTANT_DES: Perk up with an Instant Healing Brew. This minor version restores a small portion of Health, ideal for use after minor skirmishes or low falls.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_SUPER_DESCRIPTION: What it lacks in taste, it more than makes up for in effects! Promotes super Healing for a short period when consumed.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_SUPER_INSTANT_DES: Get back to good Health with the rare green Brew that gives its drinker a single super hit of Instant Health.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_INNOCUOUS_GREATER_DESCRIP: Drink Greater Innocuous Brew for calmer Creature encounters. Further reduces the range at which Creatures will attack the drinker. A temporary solution.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_INNOCUOUS_MEGA_DESCRIPTIO: The pleasantly pink Brew which temporarily allows its drinker to pass peacefully by Creatures at closer range.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_INNOCUOUS_MINOR_DESCRIPTI: Get closer to Creatures with the Petal-powered Brew that makes you seem less threatening. Temporarily reduces the range at which Creatures will attack the drinker.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_LUMINOUS_GREATER_DESCRIPT: Get an even greater glow with the Brew that gives you a brighter burst of luminosity.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_LUMINOUS_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Shine on with a temporary burst of Mega Luminosity.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_LUMINOUS_MINOR_DESCRIPTIO: Get that glowing feeling with a Luminous Brew. The vibrant Brew that temporarily allows its drinker to emit light from their body.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_GREATER_DESCRIPT: The great golden Brew that allows its drinker to slowly recover more Energy over a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_GREATER_INSTANT_: Energy getting low? Grab a Greater Instant Recovery Brew for a more potent Instant Energy Boost.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_IMPROVED_DESCRIP: The golden Brew that's even better for slow Energy Recovery.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_IMPROVED_INSTANT: The milky Brew that's guaranteed to give its consumer an improved instant Energy boost.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Feel mega with a Brew that gives its drinker unrivalled slow Energy recovery over a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_MEGA_INSTANT_DES: When you've little Energy left to burn, drink milky Mega Instant Recovery Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_MINOR_DESCRIPTIO: The answer to consistent minor Energy loss, Minor Recovery Brew recovers a small portion of Energy over time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_MINOR_INSTANT_DE: When your Energy starts to ebb, glug Minor Instant Recovery Brew to instantly recover a small portion of Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_SUPER_DESCRIPTIO: Supercharge your slow Energy recovery with Super Recovery Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_SUPER_INSTANT_DE: Give your Energy a super boost with Super Instant Recovery Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_REVIVAL_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Feeling Defeated? Harness the power of Vital Orb in this potent Reviver Brew which returns its drinker to a waking state.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STICKY_BASE_DESCRIPTION: An icky, sticky Brew to keep your feet in place on icy terrain.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_GREATER_DESCRIPT: When the going gets tough, the tough drink Greater Strength Brew to temporarily deal even more Damage per hit.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_IMPROVED_DESCRIP: Vivid purple and designed to deliver a little more Strength to its drinker. Increases Damage dealt per hit, temporarily.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Be a real hard hitter with this rare purple Brew that substantially increases the amount of Damage you can deal, for a short time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_MINOR_DESCRIPTIO: Get tough with Minor Strength Brew! Temporarily increases the amount of Damage you deal per hit.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_SUPER_DESCRIPTIO: Do even more Damage with the Super Brew that allows its drinker to deal significantly more Damage for a short time.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_MILK_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A Bucket of Wildstock Milk, but there's no need for milking! Place Wildstock Milk Gland in an Extractor to make the perfect base for Butter and some Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_MILK_FORTIFIED_DESCRIPT: A Bucket of Milk Fortified with Shimmering Orb, makes Butter better and certain Brews Mega.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_MILK_PURIFIED_DESCRIPTI: A Bucket of Wildstock Milk combined with a Charcoal purifier. A key Ingredient when making Purified Butter, Brews and Food.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_OF_LAVA_DESCRIPTION: A bucket filled with Lava, which can be used to transfer Lava to another area.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_OF_WATER_DESCRIPTION: A bucket filled with water, which can be used to transfer water to another location.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_WATER_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A refreshing Bucket of Water. A staple for making Food, Brews and other Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_WATER_FORTIFIED_DESCRIP: A Bucket of Fortified Water. Puts the Mega and Super in certain Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_WATER_PURIFIED_DESCRIPT: A Bucket of the purest Water. For Crafting when standard water just won't do.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_DEFAULT_COMPACT_DESCRIPTI: A compressed Block of Coal. Lasts longer as a Fuel in this state.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_DEFAULT_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A good Fuel source embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_HARD_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A solid Block of Hard Coal. A longer burning Fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_HARD_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: An excellent Fuel source embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_SOFT_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A compacted Block of Soft Coal. A better Fuel than before.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_SOFT_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A decent Fuel source embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTAINER_STORAGE_BASE_DESCRIP: A useful Block made with sturdy Stone. Stores up to 4 Items, combine Storage Blocks to store even more.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTAINER_STORAGE_SHELF_DESCRI: Store or display Items using a wooden Shelf. Stores up to 4 Items. Combine Shelves to create a larger Storage space.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTROL_BEACON_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: A sturdy Beacon for claiming Land. Items and Furnishings placed inside a Beacon will be safe from other Citizens and World Regeneration. Requires Fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTROL_CAMPFIRE_BASE_DESCRIPT: A simple Beacon for claiming Land. Protects Items and Furnishings placed within its reach from other Citizens and World Regeneration, until the Campfire burns out. Non-refuelable.
ITEM_TYPE_CORRUPTION_ANCIENT_BASE_DESCRI: A highly hazardous Block with fatal attributes.
ITEM_TYPE_CRYSTAL_GLEAM_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A gleaming Crystal Block used mostly for Crafting decorative fixtures.
ITEM_TYPE_CRYSTAL_GLEAM_LANTERN_DESCRIPT: A decorative lantern, which emits a blueish light.
ITEM_TYPE_CRYSTAL_GLEAM_REFINEDCRAFTED_D: A bright, crystallised Block made from Gleam. It can be used as a construction Block or Crafting Ingredient.
