ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTI: A Shovel made from Sapphire. It is most effective against Ground-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: A Silver Alloy Shovel for swift digging. Makes lighter work of ground-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A Stone Tool for more effective digging.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTI: A Shovel made from Titanium Alloy. It is most effective against Ground-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A Shovel made from Topaz. It is most effective against Ground-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A Wooden Shovel, plain and simple. Used for digging. Not particuarly durable.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_AMETHYST_DESCRIP: A ranged Weapon made from Amethyst. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_BLINK_DESCRIPTIO: A ranged Weapon made from Blink. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_COPPER_DESCRIPTI: A faster-firing ranged Weapon made from Copper. Best used against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_DARK_MATTER_DESC: A ranged Weapon made from Darkmatter. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_DIAMOND_DESCRIPT: A ranged Weapon made from Diamond. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_EMERALD_DESCRIPT: A ranged Weapon made from Emerald. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A ranged Weapon made from Gold Alloy. Does a reasonable amount of Damage to Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A solid ranged Weapon made Iron. More effective than its wooden counterpart.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_OORT_STONE_DESCR: A ranged Weapon made from Oortstone. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_RIFT_DESCRIPTION: A ranged Weapon made from Rift. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A ranged Weapon made from Ruby. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIP: A ranged Weapon made from Sapphire. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_SILVER_DESCRIPTI: A ranged Weapon that fires a little faster. Best used against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_STONE_DESCRIPTIO: A Weapon made for firing. Helps to fend off Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_TITANIUM_DESCRIP: A ranged Weapon made from Titanium Alloy. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTIO: A ranged Weapon made from Topaz. It is most effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_AMETHYST_DESCRIPT: A Spanner made from Amethyst. It can be used to repair any damaged Crafting Machines, but is more effective at repairing Forge Machines and Forge Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_COPPER_DESCRIPTIO: A shiny Copper Spanner for repairing certain Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTI: A Spanner made from Diamond. It can be used to repair any damaged Crafting Machines, but is more effective at repairing Workbench Machines and Workbench Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_EMERALD_DESCRIPTI: A Spanner made from Emerald. It can be used to repair any damaged Crafting Machines, but is more effective at repairing Mixer Machines and Mixer Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A strong Gold Spanner for repairing certain Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A strong Iron Spanner for repairing damage to some types of Machine.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A Spanner made from Ruby. It can be used to repair any damaged Crafting Machines, but is more effective at repairing Compactor Machines and Compactor Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPT: A Spanner made from Diamond. It can be used to repair any damaged Crafting Machines, but is more effective at repairing Extractor Machines and Extractor Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_SILVER_DESCRIPTIO: A Silver Spanner for repairing damaged Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A useful Tool for repairing certain types of Crafting Machine.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_TITANIUM_DESCRIPT: A Spanner made from Titanium Alloy. It can be used to repair damaged Crafting Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A Spanner made from Topaz. It can be used to repair any damaged Crafting Machines, but is more effective at repairing Refinery Machines and Refinery Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_TOTEM_DESCRIPTION: A seemingly basic Oort Tool with strange markings. Use it to gather Resources or add Augments for powerful results.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_TOTEM_FOUNDERS_DESCRIPTIO: A stronger, more advanced Oort Tool which can only be wielded by Citizens who have been around for a long time.
ITEM_TYPE_TOTEM_AMMO_DESCRIPTION: Turns a simple Totem into a powerful destination Tool. Combine the Totem and Warp Augment to enable Landing Site selection on new Worlds. Warp Augment are destroyed after each use.
ITEM_TYPE_TOTEM_AMMO_RESURRECTION_DESCRI: Turns a simple Totem into a Tool for Reviving Defeated Citizens. Combine the Totem and Revive Augment to temporarily give a Player the ability to Revive others. The Augment is consumed after each use.
ITEM_TYPE_WARP_CONDUIT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: An intricately patterned Block which can be stacked with others to create a Warp.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_DECORATIVE_DESCRI: An intriguing patterned Block for building with.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_REFINED_DESCRIPTI: A simply patterned Block used for building.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_TIMBERCRAFTED_DES: Timber made from an Ancient Tree. It can be used to craft construction materials, Weapons and Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_TIMBER_DESCRIPTIO: Cut Ancient Wood. Widely used in Crafting.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_TRUNKCRAFTED_DESC: The Trunk from an Ancient Tree. It can be used to craft Timber, Sticks and other construction materials.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_TRUNK_DESCRIPTION: A slow-growing Wood with hard Bark. A much used Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_EXOTIC_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: A frond-like Foliage sometimes used as an Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSH_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: A plentiful Foliage found in some Trees. Sometimes used in Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_DECORATIVE_DESCR: A decorated building Block. Makes a nice pattern when placed beside Blocks of the same type.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_REFINED_DESCRIPT: A patterned Block of Wood for building with.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_TIMBERCRAFTED_DE: Timber made from a Lustrous Tree. It can be used to craft construction materials, Weapons and Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_TIMBER_DESCRIPTI: Cut Lustrous Wood. Commonly used in Crafting Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_TRUNKCRAFTED_DES: The Trunk from a Lustrous Tree. It can be used to craft Timber, Sticks and other construction materials.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_TRUNK_DESCRIPTIO: A young irregular Wood. A common Recipe Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_DECORATIVE_DESCRI: A nicely decorated Wood construction Block.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_TIMBERCRAFTED_DES: Timber made from a Twisted Tree. It can be used to craft construction materials, Weapons and Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_TIMBER_DESCRIPTIO: Cut Twisted Wood. A much used Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_TRUNKCRAFTED_DESC: The Trunk from a Twisted Tree. It can be used to craft Timber, Sticks and other construction materials.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_TRUNK_DESCRIPTION: A sinewy Wood. Used widely in Crafting.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_WAXY_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: A thick, Waxy Foliage found in Trees. Occasionally used in Recipes.
